description: Chutney Mary's is the fun creative way to enjoy fusion cuisine from around the world. So Come Get Your Puchka On...Chutney Mary's is proud to bring you the delicious foods from the City of Joy, with an Anglo-Indian twist. Here at Chutney Mary's, we Specialize in "Calcutta Style Rolls", "The Chaatwala Stuff" and Special Dessert you can only find in Calcutta, yes; I am talking about Mishty Dhoi!! All our meat served is Halal, and we take the time to make, and create our sauces and marinades from fresh ingredients, for your tasty enjoyment. So stop by and check it out for yourself, thanks and see you soooon!
name: Chutney Mary's
